inclusion.criterion: T cell depleted BMT from mismatched family member or unrelated donor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: matched sibling transplant or T replete transplant with high risk of developing EBV LPD
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: GVHD of Grade II or greater
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: severe renal disease (creatinine clearance less than half normal for age)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe hepatic disease (bilirubin greater than twice normal, or SGOT greater than 3 x normal)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL with large cell transformation, received multiple treatments including FCR and R-CVP, but did not have significant response. He was switched to Campath therapy and had resolution of lymphocytosis, but no reduction in bulky lymphadenopathy.
